Author: BTC-BTC-BTC#4223
Content: Thank you  @jl777c  @SHossain and the entire Komodo team. I have received all my KMD back. I will move it again to my ledger soon. I can't say enough how well the team has handled it. Appreciate all the hardwork.

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @CobraComm you need to make sure both nodes are connected. Make sure the p2p port of each is open.

Author: CobraComm#7798
Content: i pinged to both systems and it was a success.

Author: Alright#0419
Content: You can also add `-testnode=1` to the startup params to make a network with a single node

Author: Alright#0419
Content: try `nc <ip> <p2pport>`

Author: Alright#0419
Content: the `-testnode=1` functionality isn't in master branch yet, use `beta` or `dev` branch for that

Author: CobraComm#7798
Content: yes, i am using dev branch. will ty the testnode cmd

Author: CobraComm#7798
Content: @Alright  THANK YOU!!!!!! It works.

Author: Steve10#5203
Content: I just found out a friend of mine had some KMD but didn't know about the hack.  I had him check his address and his funds were moved to the following address RVjDUCE3NDV72gghTrMTsBx4hvByKiN7gM.  It looks like his funds were stolen and not swept as thats not the safe address I read elsewhere.  Can my friend still file a claim  with the normal claim process?

Author: Steve10#5203
Content: He said there was a dust deposited into the account.

Author: Audo#5667
Content: Yes, that means he can claim it. He should follow that were posted

Author: Steve10#5203
Content: ok, thanks I'll let him know.

Author: Audo#5667
Content: I don't know about the addresses but if there's dust then it seems like it's on our address

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it was a change address to the sweep tx, the sweep address is in that tx also

Author: Steve10#5203
Content: ok thats what I missed. Figured that address might have been the hackers address.  Thanks for saving his funds!

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: only 47 valid claims for today...

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i will wait an hour before processing, so you have a bit more time to send the smartdust from the old address to the new one. waiting on 161 such transactions. if you dont send the transaction from the old address to new, you wont get a refund. the almost 400 that have done all the steps have already gotten a refund.
